purpose: Facilitates the development of AI agents for web data extraction and interaction automation.
principle: Utilizes Python libraries and web scraping techniques to automate web interactions and data extraction.
reusability: Offers a modular SDK with reusable components for building custom web AI agents, supports API integration.
limitations: Limited by the dynamic nature of websites and potential changes in web structure; requires compliance with website terms of service.
name: dendrite-python-sdk
description: Tools to build web AI agents that can authenticate, interact with and extract data from any website.
highlight: Enables creation of web AI agents capable of authenticating, interacting, and extracting data from websites.
